original_text: Their visage is blacker than a coal; they are not known in the streets: their skin cleaveth to their bones; it is withered, it is become like a stick.
korean_text: 이제는 그들의 얼굴이 숯보다 검고 그들의 가죽이 뼈들에 붙어 막대기 같이 말랐으니 어느 거리에서든지 알아볼 사람이 없도다

sentences.original_text: Their visage is blacker than a coal
they are not known in the streets
their skin cleaveth to their bones
it is become like a stick
